OH HAI THERE 👋!

I am Conor Hinchee, a Senior Full Stack Engineer who is all about delivering fantastic user experiences! I specialize in creating intuitive, blazing fast websites and applications that captivate users and drive results.

I am currently obsessed with Test-Driven Development, TypeScript, Playwright Testing, Tailwind CSS, Node, Graphql. I am an advocate for

Semantically Correct>, WCAG Accessible, Best Practice Code
